basestation.bot

Class BotManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • basestation.bot.BotManager

  • public class BotManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Tracks and manages all bots. Any bot that you create a connection to should be tracked under this manager to prevent errors.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      BotManager()
      Initializes the bot manager with a fresh map and counter

    • Method Summary

    • Method Detail

      • addBot

        public int addBot(Bot bot)
        Begins tracking bot under the BotManager and return its managed ID
        Parameters:
        bot - The bot object that was created for the bot
        Returns:
        The ID now associated with the bot

      • getBotById

        public Bot getBotById(int id)
        Parameters:
        id - the id of the robot
        Returns:
        the bot associated with id or null if none exists

      • removeBotById

        public void removeBotById(int botId)
        Removes bot with id botId from
        Parameters:
        botId - the id of the robot

      • getAllTrackedBotIDs

        public java.util.Set<java.util.Map.Entry<java.lang.Integer,Bot>> getAllTrackedBotIDs()
        Returns the IDs of all currently tracked bots from the BotManager. The bots may not be active if the module using the BotManager is not careful to remove inactive bots.
        Returns:
        Integer IDs representing all bots being tracked by the BaseStation

      • getAllTrackedBots

        public java.util.Collection<Bot> getAllTrackedBots()
        Returns:
        A collection of all bots being tracked by the BotManager.
